frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-application-view-text
frozen.shortDescription: The text in the Application view can be hard to read on a light coloured background. This extension makes the text bolder with a drop shadow.
frozen.longDescription:
The text in the Application view can be hard to read on a light coloured background. This extension makes the text bolder with a drop shadow.
Also improves the visibility of the app running dot.
